item.title: AES
item.description: score:-5 Chances: AES is focusing on renewable energy investments, which could provide growth opportunities in the future. The company has announced positive momentum in its first-quarter results, reaffirming its 2023 guidance. AES recently acquired the largest permitted solar-plus-storage project in the United States, positioning itself in the renewable energy sector.
